ygData.subject: RE: Some Equipment Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: How Much do Obsidian Bead Hoops normally cost? ...   ... ===== Hammeron Stonespirit Monk of Quellious Karana
ygData.messageBody:
How Much do Obsidian Bead Hoops normally cost?


--- Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...> wrote:
> Obsidian Bead Hoop: AC 2, INT +3, AGI +3, comon drop
> from Singe, named drake
> in Sol A.
>
> Tsin Suchiko
> 3th rank, Tunare.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
> Sent: Saturday, December 18, 1999 10:05 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Some Equipment Questions
>
>
> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
>
> Most of the high level monks I know including myself
> wear obsidian bead hoop
> earrings from singe in Sol A they have AC and agil
> (dont remember the stats)
> + some int.
>
> Kizmet Bayashi
> Monk of the 46th previously 47th level (friggin POF
> is hard on exp)
> E-Marr
>
<HR>
<html>

Hammeron Stonespirit
Monk of Quellious
